channel.title: SevenAtSevenPolitics

item.title: Trump Ending Wars Is Wonderful, But Only One Thing Can Get Him Into Heaven
item.description: Trump may have been joking, but it bears repeating: None of your own works, not even saving lives, can earn you a spot in paradise.

item.title: Trump Has No Power to Tell States How to Conduct Elections
item.description: While Congress may override state election regulations, the president has no such power.

item.title: The Economic Consequences of Donald Trump
